alert.note: Alert for Arenac; Gladwin; Kalkaska; Otsego; Presque Isle; Wexford (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 12 at 8:23PM EDT until April 13 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Gaylord
info.description: ...Red Flag Warning Thursday afternoon... .Unseasonably warm temperatures will continue again on Thursday along with critical relative humidities. In addition, winds are forecast to become gusty through much of the day. This will result in dangerous fire weather conditions once again across parts of northern lower Michigan. . ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 8 PM EDT THURSDAY FOR PORTIONS OF NORTHERN LOWER MICHIGAN... The National Weather Service in Gaylord has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect from noon to 8 PM EDT Thursday. * TIMING...Beginning noon EDT Thursday and continuing through 8pm EDT. * WINDS...West to southwest 15 to 20 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 19 to 24 percent. * TEMPERATURES...76 to 83 degrees. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now....or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Arenac; Gladwin; Kalkaska; Otsego; Presque Isle; Wexford
